means: 除杂草( weed的过去式和过去分词 )
很小的，极小的( wee的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: She went from place to place, and dug and weeded.
sentence.Network_cn: 她到处走, 又挖土,又锄草.

sentence.Network_en: They weeded out useless books from library.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们从图书室里淘汰无用的书.

sentence.Network_en: A crop can be sown, weeded, irrigated, and fertilized uniformly.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种作物可以均匀一致地进行播种, 除草, 灌溉和施肥.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 除草的的英文|除草的是什么意思|Show秀网... ... 未除草的 ： unweeded 被除草的 ： weeded 除草剂的抗性 ： Herbicide tolerance.

list.abs: 口译专业词汇专场 ... Indian meal 玉米粉 Indian weed 烟草 Italian hand 暗中干预.

entry.def: A weed is a wild plant that grows in gardens or fields of crops and prevents the plants that you want from growing properly.
Weed is a plant that grows in water and usually forms a thick floating mass. There are many different kinds of weed.

example.ex: Large, clogging banks of weed are the only problem.
example.tran: 唯一的问题就是大量水草阻塞了水道。

entry.def: If you weed an area, you remove the weeds from it.

example.tran: 卡斯珀正在给花园除杂草。

example.ex: Try not to walk on the flower beds when weeding or hoeing.
example.tran: 拔草和锄地时尽量不要踩到花坛。

entry.def: People sometimes refer to tobacco or marijuana as weed .

example.ex: Two and a half years ago I gave up the evil weed.
example.tran: 两年半以前我改邪归正，不抽大麻了。

auth_sentence.content: They typically weeded out dead or dying trees, and were an important part of the ecosystem.

auth_sentence.content: Evolution wise I would think Long term depression would have weeded itself out as mal-adaptive behavior.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Evolution wise I would think Long term depression would have weeded itself out as mal-adaptive behavior.

auth_sentence.content: If a population gets too big it often gets sick and is weeded down to a much more manageable number.
